name: Cilantro-Lime Grilled Chicken
author: muchemwa
summary: This marinated grilled chicken is not only fast and easy, it's also budget-friendly and kid-approved! Serve with lime wedges and pico de gallo.
ingredients: 1 whole whole chicken, cut into 6 pieces
directions: Whisk lime juice, cilantro, garlic salt, and black pepper together in a large glass or ceramic bowl
Add chicken; toss to evenly coat
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator, 30 minutes to overnight
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Remove chicken from marinade and shake off excess
Cook chicken on the preheated grill, turning occasionally, until no longer pink at the bone and juices run clear, about 30 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
